snippet: The former Dire Straits frontman canceled two performances scheduled for June because of what he sees as the government’s harassment of human rights groups.
abstract: The former Dire Straits frontman canceled two performances scheduled for June because of what he sees as the government’s harassment of human rights groups.

headline.main: Mark Knopfler Cancels Shows in Russia
headline.print_headline: Mark Knopfler Cancels Shows in Russia as a Protest

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
